refnamediv.refpurpose: Used to interact with a graph based visualization of the structure of .g databases.

refsection.para: Used to interact with a graph based visualization of the structure of .g databases. The "view" subcommand launches a window in which the graph for the .g database is displayed. The "positions" subcommand displays for each object in the geometric database its name, type, node and vertex positions within the graph.
The examples demonstrate the use of the graph command and subcommands to view the corresponding graph of a .g database and access information about it.

info.title: Launches a new window that displays the graph that corresponds to a .g database.

listitem.para: Displays a graph that corresponds to the currently opened .g database.

info.title: Lists the names, types, positions of the corresponding nodes and vertices within the graph for the objects in the .g database.

varlistentry.para: Lists the names, types, positions of the corresponding nodes and vertices within the graph for the objects in the currently opened .g database.

refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
